SELECT*from meeting where meeting_views is not null order by meeting_views desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table. * , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( select*from meeting where meeting_center = #{value} order by meeting_views desc ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= 3) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT ma.meeting_act_count, u.profile_img as master_profile_img, ma.act_location as meeting_location, ma.act_date as meeting_date, ma.act_time as meeting_time, ma.act_dues as meeting_dues,mcl.role FROM meeting_act ma, users u, meeting_crew_list mcl Where ma.meeting_no = mcl.meeting_no and mcl.crew_id = u.user_id and mcl.role = 'MST' and ma.meeting_no = #{meetingNo}

select u.user_id as meeting_master_id, u.profile_img as master_profile_img, u.nick_name as crew_nick_name, cl.role from meeting_crew_list cl, users u where u.user_id= cl.crew_id and cl.crew_condition = 'YES' and cl.meeting_no= #{meetingNo} order by cl.role desc
